==German== ===Etymology=== From {{m|de|reisend||traveling}}, present participle of the verb {{m|de|reisen||to travel}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ˈraɪ̯zn̩dɐ/}} ===Noun=== {{de-noun|m|Reisenden|Reisende|f=Reisende}} # [[tourist]] # [[traveller]], [[voyager]] ====Declension==== {{de-decl-adj+noun-m|Reisend||-|pl=|datpl=}} ====Derived terms==== * {{l|de|Handelsreisender}} ====Related terms==== * {{l|de|Reisende}} ===Noun=== {{head|de|noun form|g=f}} # {{inflection of|de|Reisende||gen|s}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}} * [https://www.dwds.de/wb/Reisender Reisender] in DWDS (''Digitales Wörterbuch der deutschen Sprache'')
